Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
The UMES Campus is a very safe environment for all students because we have round the clock cops makeing sure the students and staff are safe everyday of the week.
Not that sororities, just a few.
UMES has a lot of clubs and activities in which any one can join and if there isn't a club that suits your needs you allowed to create your own club.
UMES is a great school for individuals who are enthusiastic about culture and individuals who are always up for a challenge.
Nothing unusual.
UMES is a very affordable school about 16,000 a year.

Like every college attending parties are always something to do for fun if you like that kind of atmosphere. however if you are not the school also has game night where we have different recreational activities, then we have movie night, and the list goes on and on but most importantly joining a clubs that suit you.

In my opinion the food is pretty decent. the cafeteria has a wide variety of food such as salads, pizza, eggplant parmesan, rice pilaf, fried chicken, egg noddles, and the list goes on. We also have slushies, ice cream bar and cakes for desert.

The rooms a pretty big, its clean, and everyone is nice to each other. however visitation rules are pretty strict. we are in the fifth week of school and we still are not allowed visitation yet, male or female.
The academic rigor is pretty strict depending on what your major is. basically the easier your major is the less your academic rigor will be and vice versa.
Prospectives students should come to UMES to have fun and discover self identity but also come prepared to learn and keep up with academics in order to graduate on time.
Overall i would rate UMES a 7 out of 10.
pageTitle: University of Maryland Eastern Shore (UMES) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students If you are into the Criminal Justice major, this is your place. The Criminal Justice here is amazing! As well as the Math and Computer Science department!...This is the best place to come if you really and truly are up for a change and a new beginning! Tips for prospective students Get to know people around...it can make your college experience best! Also, make sure that you study more than you party...it will pay off at the end! Bang for the buck Overall, i give the school an A..it has room for improvement! Am enjoying being here The campus is beautiful, the dorms are comfortable and the learning environment is perfect. Am learning a lot The Professors here at UMES are awesome they let you know step by step what it is that you need to know and they also are very accessible when you need to see them. Are there just some subjects you are so week in and you have to take? Tutoring is available everyday and they are an BIG HELP! Login to rate
